subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Big Brown’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, was reluctant to call the horse one of the best that has ever lived. But in 20 days, after a mile and a half in the Belmont Stakes, the public will know for sure if he is a horse for the ages.
snippet: Big Brown’s trainer, Rick Dutrow, was reluctant to call the horse one of the best that has ever lived. But in 20 days, after a mile and a half in the Belmont Stakes, the public will know for sure if he is a horse for the ages.
